alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 6:42AM CST until December 13 at 7:15AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CST FOR EASTERN SEMINOLE AND NORTHWESTERN HUGHES COUNTIES... At 642 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Castle to 5 miles northwest of Yeager to 6 miles north of Sasakwa, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Holdenville, Wewoka, Wetumka, Cromwell, Horntown, Yeager and Lima. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
